title.en: Past Continuous - Interrupted Actions & Questions (Pasado continuo)
title.es: Past Continuous - Interrupted Actions & Questions (Pasado continuo)

description.en: Learn to use Past Continuous (was/were + -ing) for actions that were happening when something else occurred. Master the interrogative form with subject-verb inversion.
description.es: Aprende a usar Past Continuous (was/were + -ing) para acciones que estaban sucediendo cuando algo más ocurrió. Domina la forma interrogativa con inversión sujeto-verbo.

prompt.es: Estaba viendo la televisión cuando llamaste.

exercises.solution: I was watching television when you called.
